name: inefficiency
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a lack of organization or skill that wastes time, energy, money, etc., or methods or actions that waste time, etc. in this way: gross inefficiency They were accused of gross inefficiency in their handling of the case. It is a troubled organization, plagued by inefficiencies. See
inefficient
More examplesFewer examplesData on the medical liability system reveals massive costs and gross inefficiency.Authorities say the new system will help keep residents informed and help eliminate problems and inefficiencies. They faced numerous bureaucratic inefficiencies.
